author: skitching
msg: Upgrade to latest maven-surefire-plugin. Also move a dependency

author: gnodet
msg: SMX4KNL-13: startup issue in recognizing new files in deploy folder

author: ltheussl
msg: Re-organized the abstract sink test, EOLs are not filtered out
anymore, sink tests are now supposed to test the occurence of EOLs.
That's ugly and inconvenient but avoids any surprises when sinks
use some special writers for pretty-printing (like LineBreaker).

author: etnu
msg: Allowed per-syndicator features to use a comma separated list rather than a single value.
